titles.title: To repeal the authorizations for office space, office expenses, franking and printing privileges, and staff for former Speakers of the House of Representatives.
To repeal the authorizations for office space, office expenses, franking and printing privileges, and staff for former Speakers of the House of Representatives.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: This bill repeals specified authorizations for office space, office expenses, franking and printing privileges, and staff for former Speakers of the House.
